Source

Features¶

Accesesing Raw Data¶

Download.SFTP(source, destination, hostname, …) Connect to a remote server using a Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP).
Download.REDCap(path, token, url, content[, …]) Download data from an Research Electronic Data Capture (REDCap) server.
Download.box(source, destination, server, …) Connect to Box cloud cloud storage service, using File Transfer Protocol over SSL (FTPS).

Preprocessing¶

Processing.preprocess(self, df, window) Initial data cleaning.
Processing.run(self, path[, task_type, …]) Processing of data.

Data Analysis¶

Model.anova(config, y, f, df, csv, path, effects) Run analysis of variance model using rpy2, seaborn and pandas.
Model.lmer(config, y, f, df, exclude, csv, …) Run linear mixed regression model, using rpy2, seaborn and pandas.
Model.logistic(config, y, f, df, me, …[, …]) Run logistic regression model, using rpy2, seaborn and pandas.

Relational plots¶

plot.bokeh_calibration(config, df, cxy, event) Create calibration matrix, using pandas and bokeh.
plot.bokeh_trial(config, df, stim_bounds, …) Create single subject trial bokeh plots.
plot.cooks_plot(config, y, model, path, df) Create cooks distance plot plot using seaborn, pandas, and statsmodel.
plot.corr_matrix(config, df, path, title, method) Create correlation matrix using bokeh and pandas.
plot.density_plot(config, df, title) Create density plot (draws kernel density estimate), using seaborn and pandas.
plot.logit_plot(config, df, path, param) Create logistic regression plot using seaborn and pandas
plot.onset_diff_plot(config, df, meta, drop, y) Plot onset differences using pandas and seaborn.
plot.qq_plot(config, y, residuals, path) Create probability plot using seaborn, pandas, and rpy2.
plot.residual_plot(config, y, residuals, path) Create probability plot using seaborn, pandas, and rpy2.
